attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE in every. Single. Way. My dog almost died because he was on this app. I can’t believe that trump made this dog killer. I’m horrified. My cat told me himself “my catnip is gone from the trump 2020 app”. This is nasty and uncalled for. Delete this app now.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and I thought it was my phone when I downloaded it on another phone it broke the other phone just delete this app!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app dose not work as soon as I tried to open it, it completely shut down. They should really get this app off of the Apple Store I really am sorry for whoever likes this app!👎
attributes.title: Worst App ever!!!

attributes.review: This app is horrible i hate this app donald trum is nothing why he is doing this he is going to deleted TikTok like that’s so bad because people are going to be sad i have TikTok and i dont want this app to go...😡😡🤬🤬🤬i dont like this😡

attributes.review: Don’t rlly know why this is an app only up here to see what y’all president is doing wrong 😭🤧 welp that’s it 😗🖤 if ur offended seems like a personal problem and I’m sorry that I can’t help you with that xoxo 🐍😗

attributes.review: The app literally takes your parents and runs off with them. My grandmas fridge blew up from this, highly recommend not using this app
Honestly I am incredibly disappointed and angry. This app had a bunch of inappropriate images and language. It hurt my eyes to look at and didn’t work at all.

attributes.review: After downloading this app with high hopes. I realized it was incredibly dangerous. Did you know it can cause cancer?? How can the App Store allow this kind of danger to the public???  So disappointed. 🤮
attributes.title: This app causes cancer

attributes.review: This app looks like it was designed by a child! There is no organization and the app overall is lacking at best. It isn’t even functional and makes my phone glitch!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
